title: Hollywood Meets Sports in HBO's Lakers Series
itunes:title: Hollywood Meets Sports in HBO's Lakers Series
description:
"Winning Time" Co-Creator and Executive Producer Jim Hecht discusses his HBO series about the 1980s LA Lakers.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
